# TBSBV — Transparent Business Solutions B.V.

> Transparent Business Solutions B.V. (TBSBV) is a licensed Dutch private investigation firm specializing in cybersecurity, cyber investigations, due diligence, crypto tracing, and reputation management. Based in The Hague, Netherlands, serving clients across 45+ countries. Licensed by the Dutch Ministry of Justice and Security under POB number 07373. Registered at KVK: 78091624.

## Services

- [Due Diligence](https://tbsbv.com/services/due-diligence/): Comprehensive corporate and financial assessments including corporate structure and beneficial ownership review, regulatory status verification, litigation and enforcement screening, risk exposure analysis, and online and dark web presence checks.
- [Cyber Investigations](https://tbsbv.com/services/cyber-investigations/): In-depth digital inquiries into online fraud, financial crime, impersonation schemes, and coordinated scam operations. Analysis of digital footprints, email infrastructure, social engineering patterns, and platform abuse.
- [Crypto Tracing](https://tbsbv.com/services/crypto-tracing/): Advanced cryptocurrency tracing using blockchain forensics to track stolen digital assets, identify exchange off-ramps and custodial endpoints, map transaction pathways across multiple blockchains, and produce forensic reports for legal and regulatory use.
- [Reputation Management](https://tbsbv.com/services/reputation-management/): Digital reputation protection including risk assessments, defamatory content monitoring and removal, strategic content suppression, digital footprint optimization, and crisis response support.
